extension.summary: Extended version of the TIDAL music add-on
extension.description:
Play music and video from TIDAL music streaming service.
Requires subscription. Visit tidal.com for details.

Spielt Music und Videos vom Streaming-Dienst TIDAL.
Es wird ein Abbonement benötigt. Siehe tidal.com für Details.
extension.disclaimer: This is an unofficial client and is not supported nor endorsed by TIDAL.
Dies ist eine inoffizieller Client, der von TIDAL nicht unterstützt wird.

extension.news: v2.0.0-beta14 (2017-04-06) - Fixed "RTMP-Protocol for High/Low Quality" for Kodi Krypton (Krypton can decode RTMP Audio Streams without the inputstream.rtmp Addon) - Fixed Video Playback if the Android Login Token is used (FLAC 16-Bit Mode) - New Option to enable HTTP Video Streaming instead of HLS (max. resolution is 720p) - Added a Service which asks for a re-login if Streaming Options are changed (only for Kodi versions >= 16.1)
